properties.areaDesc: Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Central Chippewa
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 4:00PM EST until January 9 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of
an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast
Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties.

* WHEN...From 3 PM to 10 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute. Light freezing rain
may accumulate on area roadways, walking surfaces, and power
lines.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY
